article.title: Los Angeles - Downtown U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Los Angeles - Downtown U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
Los Angeles - DowntownU.S. Export Assistance Center​

444 S. Flower St., 37th Floor

Los Angeles, CA 90071
Phone: 213-894-8784

Los Angeles - DowntownU.S. Export Assistance Center Staff

Rachid Sayouty, Director
Phone: 213-894-4022
Fax: 213-894-5432
Email:rachid.sayouty@trade.gov
Industries: Electrical Power Systems, Films/Videos, Oil/Gas Field Machinery, Oil/Gas/Mineral Prod/Explor Serv., Renewable Energy Eq.

Bobby Hines, International Trade Specialist
Phone: 213-894-4231
Fax: 213-894-8789
Email:bobby.hines@trade.gov
Industries: Apparel, Cosmetics/Toiletries, Food Processing/Packaging Eq., Foods - Processed, Footwear, Jewelry, Leather/Fur Products, Textile Fabrics, Textile Machinery/Eq., Textile Products - Made-Up, Yarns

Amy Magat, International Trade Specialist
Phone: 213-894-3966
Fax: 213-894-1197
Email:amy.magat@trade.gov
Industries: Aircraft/Aircraft Parts, Airport/Ground Support Eq., Architectural/Constr./Engineering SVC, Aviation Services, Building Products, Defense Industry Eq., Machine Tools/Metalworking Eq., Tools - Hand/Power, Toys/Games

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 ​am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.

​
